summary:
An extremely useless goat that follows you forever.
Forever.
It can not die.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever played skyrim and thought; "Man, I really wish I had a pet goat."

Well then, this is the mod for you.
It adds a 100% lore friendly Goat follower that does absolutly nothing.

Literally, nothing.

It can not fight.
It can not leave.
It can not carry your items.
It can't even be talked to.

It follows you, and it can not die. Ever.

It can be [color=#e69138][size=3][i]found at the Honningbrew Meadery[/i][/size][/color] from the start of the game.

It can only be removed from the game by disabling or uninstalling the .esp

Still haven't sold you? Then get the hell out.


____________________________________
[size=4]Installation[/size]

1. Just copy the Data file into your Skyrim install dirrectory, [color=#e69138][i][size=3]most likelyÂ [/size][/i][/color] [i]C:/Program Files(x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim[/i]
2. Select "Merge Folders" upon pasting

____________________________________
Uninstallation
Delete "NillyGoat.esp" from your ...Skyrim/Data folder
